ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: If( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate ) < DATE(2019,08,23) ,false,If( AND(OR(Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0003', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0004', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0016', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0017', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0018', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = 'V0019', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12326', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12327', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12347', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12348', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12432', Service_Type_Matrix_Code__c = '12433' ), ISBLANK(ATM_ADM_Location__c),NOT( Is_Migrated__c )), true,false))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: กรุณาระบุค่า
